main event: Three blue-white objects with brilliant lights were observed traveling in a straight line over Weymouth, New Jersey on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were traveling west and faded out of sight after about 3 minutes., They were described as very bright and followed each other in succession., The observers believed they may have seen lights from an aircraft., The sky was clear during the sighting., The sighting was recorded under Project Blue Book, which aims to investigate UFOs.
sighted object: three blue-white brilliant lights in the sky
